name: This Is More Like It (V)
Lore: '''You like me because I''m a scoundrel. There aren''t enough scoundrels in your life.'' ''I happen to like nice men.'' ''I''m a nice man.'' ''No you''re not, you''re ..''',
Text: 'Cancel an attempt to target a scoundrel (or a starship or vehicle piloted by a scoundrel) with a weapon. OR At any time during your turn, deploy a [Scoundrel] Effect from under Scoundrel''s Luck (or transfer a [Scoundrel] Effect to another scoundrel on table).',
